q: WINDSOR, Ontario( AP)-- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products

such as Facebook Google Inc. , the social networking phenomenon that is vying with Google Inc. for Internet advertising revenue. To get back its mojo, Google Inc. may be returning to its start-up roots. A lot of the growth of the company used to be driven by innovation, said Yun Kim, an analyst at investment firm Gleacher& Co.`` Having someone with the very strong products background that Larry has could bring some innovation back to Google Inc. .'' Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings.___

There's always going to be room for improvement, so we'll be working with the Commission to address any concerns, spokesman Al Verney said.
